story-context.title: Security Scanning
story-context.summary: Implements comprehensive security scanning system for code, dependencies, and artifacts. Provides vulnerability detection, security policy enforcement, and compliance checking with multiple scanning tools and integrations.

acceptance-criteria.criteria: Scan code for security vulnerabilities and issues
Support multiple security scanning tools (SAST, DAST, SCA)
Enforce security policies and compliance requirements
Provide security risk assessment and scoring
Support custom security rules and policies
Implement security trend analysis and reporting

method.implementation: 1. Validate scan request 2. Select appropriate tools 3. Prepare scan environment 4. Execute tools in parallel 5. Aggregate scan results 6. Apply security policies 7. Check compliance requirements 8. Generate reports 9. Store scan results 10. Return scan execution

method.name: getScanResults
method.implementation: 1. Validate scan ID 2. Retrieve scan execution 3. Check access permissions 4. Return scan results

method.name: execute

method.name: execute

method.name: execute

method.name: execute

method.name: execute

consideration.name: Scan Data Protection
consideration.implementation: - Sanitize scan inputs - Encrypt scan results - Control access to findings - Implement data retention policies

consideration.name: Tool Security
consideration.implementation: - Validate tool configurations - Use secure communication - Monitor tool behavior - Update tools regularly

consideration.name: Result Integrity
consideration.implementation: - Digitally sign results - Maintain audit trails - Validate result authenticity - Prevent result tampering

consideration.name: Access Control
consideration.implementation: - Implement role-based access - Use principle of least privilege - Monitor access patterns - Audit security operations

metric.name: scan_execution_time
metric.description: Time taken to execute security scans

risk.name: False Positives
risk.mitigation: - Use multiple scanning tools - Implement result correlation - Allow false positive marking - Continuously tune rules

risk.name: Scan Failures
risk.mitigation: - Implement retry mechanisms - Use fallback tools - Monitor scan health - Provide manual override

risk.name: Vulnerability Database Outdated
risk.mitigation: - Regular database updates - Use multiple sources - Implement change monitoring - Provide update notifications

risk.name: Security Fatigue
risk.mitigation: - Prioritize critical findings - Provide remediation guidance - Automate where possible - Track progress metrics
